content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1) with a status of working and currently full on output.
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0) with a status of working.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has available space for the items being inserted. Check the inventory of the furnace to avoid inserting when it is full.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Repeated errors in inserting iron ore into the furnaces
- Avoid inserting items into the furnaces multiple times in quick succession without checking their status. This can lead to unnecessary actions and potential inventory issues.
